item.title: So Now We Know How C-3PO Got His Red Arm In The Force Awakens
item.description:
So Now We Know How C-3PO Got His Red Arm In The Force Awakens

Ladies and gentlemen, our global nightmare is over. After months-nearly five of them in fact-of waiting, Marvel's one-shot comic, revealing just why C-3PO has a red arm for most of The Force Awakens, is finally here. As bizarre as it may sound at first, the final product isn't half bad.

item.title: Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.
item.description:
Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.

The DÃ¼sseldorf photographer Thomas Ruff is having his day in the sun, with the Art Gallery of Ontario's 'Object Relations', a major solo show, opening this month. Closer to home, Chelsea's David Zwirner Gallery is celebrating Ruff's latest series of work.

item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.
